001package org.relationlearn.filters;
002
003import java.io.FileInputStream;
004import java.io.IOException;
005import java.io.ObjectInputStream;
006import java.util.Arrays;
007import java.util.List;
008import org.relationlearn.util.TextUtils;
009import weka.core.Attribute;
010
011/**
012 * An implementation of TextFilter which returns the ratio of words that
013 * have been found of the total amount of words specified in a given word
014 * list.
015 */
016public class WordOcurrenceFilter implements TextFilter {
017    
018    private final Attribute FILTER_ATTR;
019    
020    private final List<String> WORDS_LIST;
021    
022    private WordOcurrenceFilter() {
023        this.FILTER_ATTR = null;
024        this.WORDS_LIST = null;
025    }
026    
027    /**
028     * Constructs a WordOcurrenceFilter with the Attribute name set
029     * to {@code name} and using the serialized list of words found
030     * in {@code path} as word list.
031     * 
032     * @param name the name this TextFilter Attribute will have
033     * @param path the path to the serialized list of words
034     */
035    public WordOcurrenceFilter(String name, String path) {
036        List<String> words = getWordsFromFile(path);
037        this.FILTER_ATTR = new Attribute(name);
038        this.WORDS_LIST = words;
039    }
040    
041    /**
042     * Constructs a WordOcurrenceFilter with the Attribute name set
043     * to {@code name} and using the list of words found
044     * in {@code words} as word list.
045     * 
046     * @param name the name this TextFilter Attribute will have
047     * @param words the list of words to use
048     */
049    public WordOcurrenceFilter(String name, List<String> words) {
050        this.FILTER_ATTR = new Attribute(name);
051        this.WORDS_LIST = words;
052    }
053    
054    @Override
055    public Attribute getMappedAttribute() {
056        return FILTER_ATTR;
057    }
058    
059    @Override
060    public double filter(String r, String h) {
061        List<String> rlst = Arrays.asList(TextUtils.getWordsFromText(r));
062        List<String> hlst = Arrays.asList(TextUtils.getWordsFromText(h));
063        int foundWords = 0, totalWords = WORDS_LIST.size();
064        for(String word : WORDS_LIST) {
065            if(rlst.contains(word) || hlst.contains(word)) {
066                foundWords++;
067            }
068        }
069        return ((double) foundWords / (double) totalWords);
070    }
071    
072    private List<String> getWordsFromFile(String path) {
073        List<String> words;
074        ObjectInputStream ois;
075        try {
076            ois = new ObjectInputStream(new FileInputStream(path));
077            words = (List<String>) ois.readObject();
078            ois.close();
079        } catch (IOException ex) {
080            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Error in file: " + 
081                    ex.getMessage());
082        } catch (ClassNotFoundException ex) {
083            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Error in class cast: " + 
084                    ex.getMessage());
085        }
086        return words;
087    }
088
089}
